message.body: Soooooo, if I rolled into Boston next Saturday night would you be able to hang out lady?
Come!!!
Will you be ok if I'm depressed. Amelia. I am a sad creature these days and I don't know why!
I think I'll be so happy to see you though!!!
All the more reason for me to come see you my dear! I found a really cheap ticket but I wouldn't get in till around 11 on Saturday night, would that be ok?
Yes. Ill try to meey you at the airport!
Daniel would come Sunday night and we'd leave Monday because we're helping
Ok
his friend move from Boston to new york.
Ill prob have to get some work done during that time but we should be ok!
This sounds great!!!
I'm so excited
I'm really looking forward to this. I really need it
I was gonna take the bus, the ticket is only $11!
Yay! I'll book a ticket!
I just bought a ticket. $2! I'll actually get in around 1:30 in the afternoon on Saturday. If you're busy I can wander around for a bit. Does that work?
Perfect!!!
Great! I'm so excited to see you!
Me2
We need it
Totally:)
Amelia I think you are saving me!!!!
I feel like a weight has been lifted
I'm so happy to hear that! I love you darlin, this will be so great, I really need this too, you always inspire me,
I've been in a slump and I feel like we always bring the best out of each other.
I can't wait to see you!
:) yes. We will read and write and sit in the most beautiful museums
And let me know what groceries I can pick up for you!!
Sounds wonderful. Perfect:)
You don't need to get me anything! Or maybe we could go together and make a nice dinner.
Heehee
Ok ok. We will cook a nice dinner! I've been so bad with food Amelia I just don't care, the therapist I'm seeing suggested I buy ensure so I wouldn't eat so much pizza
I should probably do that myself. I'm so bad with food. The food I way is pretty healthy, I just hardly ever eat.
Speaking of which, I need to go find something to eat.
